articles.title: World Antimicrobial Awareness Week - World Health Organization
articles.description:
By Dr Poonam Khetrapal Singh, WHO Regional Director for South-East Asia

Antimicrobial resistance (AMR) continues to pose a significant challenge to global public health, with devastating effects on the efficacy of essential medicines…
